title: The NFL’s New Media Deal
itunes:title: The NFL’s New Media Deal
description:
Dr. Ian Lustbader, Clinical Professor of Medicine at NYU Langone, provides a coronavirus and vaccine update. Bloomberg News Corporate Finance Reporter Davide Scigliuzzo talks about the story “Wall Street’s Biggest Blooper: How Citigroup Lost $500 Million.” Tuna Amobi, Media Analyst at CFRA Research, discusses the NFL’s new media deal. And we Drive to the Close with Lamar Villere, Portfolio Manager at Villere Funds.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
